ABOUT ME?
I am a student at VIT University, AP, I'm passionate about exploring the realms of technology, particularly in Java and Python. Since my 9th grade, coding has been a source of fascination for me and still it is. Outside the realm of code, I channel my creativity into sketching, photography, and cinematography. Whether it's capturing the beauty of the world through a lens or expressing my thoughts on paper. Gaming, both digital and physical, is another avenue where I indulge in leisure. It's not just about entertainment; it's about strategy, teamwork, and the thrill of competition. So Let's connect and explore the endless possibilities and infinite wonders!
